DOC.brief_title: Effect Prenatal Counseling Breastfeeding Rates Twins
DOC.detailed_description: In singleton pregnancy , three randomize study recently examine influence antenatal breastfeed education breastfeed rate ( Su et al . 2007 ; Mattar et al . 2007 ; Wong et al . 2014 ) . Two study find difference total breastfeed rate group receive receive antenatal breastfeed education infant ' age 6 month old ( Su et al . 2007 ; Wong et al . 2014 ) . However , Su et al . find higher exclusive breastfeed rate 6-months-old infant group receive antenatal counseling . In contrast , Mattar et al . 2007 find significantly difference breastfeeding rate individual counseling compare non-counseling breastfeed educational material counseling . Few study investigate breastfeed twin specifically , even few focused duration breastfeed twin infant . Furthermore , literature search , find study breastfeed twin investigate effect antenatal education breastfeeding twin . Our hypothesis mother twin receive specific antenatal counseling breastfeed high rate breastfeed mother receive antenatal breastfeeding counseling . Therefore , purpose study investigate effect specific antenatal breastfeeding counsel breastfeed rate twin pregnancy .
DOC.criteria: twin pregnancy fetuses alive 18 34 week gestational age follow twin clinic ; absence absolute contraindication breastfeed , positive serology HIV , HTLV ; absence use lactation inhibitor treat prolactinoma , cabergoline bromocriptine ; absence major malformation one twin could preclude breastfeeding , include gastrointestinal defect , cleave lip cleft palate , malformation would require neonatal surgery prolong hospital stay . fetal postnatal death one twin ; delivery 32 week ; major malformation diagnose postnatal ; lose follow breastfeed information .
